Name: Arcadius
About the game: Arcadius is a relaxing multiplayer resource gathering sim. Explore an open world while collecting and gathering hundreds of unique resources with other players. Compete to be the best at your skill & enjoy over 90 achievements on launch. Fishing Skill: Fishing allows you to collect a lot of unique fish, The rarer the fish, the more money it's worth and the more XP you will receive. Fish are native to their environment, You can fish in multiple different environments such as ponds, oceans, and lava. Buy bait and craft new rods in order to improve your chances of catching more and rarer fish! Mining Skill: The islands of Arcadius are filled with unique ores each one is harder to obtain than the other. However, mining is the basis of all other skills as you will need to refine these ores into bars so you can craft the best tools imaginable! There are over 16 unique ores with more to come with each update. Woodcutting Skill: Every tool in Arcadius will need some sort of wood, Tree cutting is a tedious task but an important one. Each tree are spread out across the lands of arcadius Crafting: After a hard day's work of gathering resources you can head to the workbench and craft new tools, But only if you meet that skills level requirement. Collections: Over 200 collectible items exist in the world Arcadius and this list expands with each and every update. Fish, tools, wood, ores, harvestables all count towards completing your collection and maximizing your achievement gain. Smelting: Every ore can be smelted in Arcadius, Most crafting recipes require a more refined resource. Using coal or wood as the fuel you can forge bars that help compact your inventory and get used for crafting. Explore Islands: On launch, Arcadius has two unique islands, Mount Chibi a beautiful active island for all Arcadians alike, and Mouth Magma a dangerous volcanic island with rare resources and lava, But beware it's a long swim. Upgrade Tools: Speak to the Blacksmith on the island if you wanna upgrade your current tools. But every upgrade has a cost.
